mapper.insert: INSERT into content(ID, TITLE, BODY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL) values (CONTENT_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{body}, sysdate, sysdate, #{categoryId},#{userEmail})
mapper.update: update CONTENT set TITLE = #{title}, BODY = #{body}, UPDATED_DATE = sysdate where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID, TITLE, BODY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, USER_EMAIL from CONTENT where ID > 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
